sentences.en: a slavish adherence to the rules
He was no slavish admirer of logic.
His style a slavish imitation of his teacher's.
sentences.cn: 这不是伦勃朗的真品,是赝品.

sentences.en: His style is a slavish imitation of his teacher's.
sentences.cn: 他一味模仿教师的风格,毫无创意.

sentences.en: It was essential that the Europeans break away from slavish adherence to authority.
sentences.cn: 欧洲人必须摆脱对权威的俯首听命.

sentences.en: She herself insists she is no slavish follower of fashion.
sentences.cn: 她坚称自己绝不会一味地追随时尚。

sentences.en: Their lives seemed to me so petty, so slavish.
sentences.cn: 他们的生活在我看来是那样卑微, 那么俗气.

sentences.en: Their slavish devotion to the leader is unhealthy.
sentences.cn: 他们对领导的盲目崇拜是不健康的.

sentences.en: Too perfect. A few years of slavish worship would be enough to ruin any of us.
sentences.cn: 正是因为他过于完美, 几年的奴性崇拜就足以把我们都毁了.

sentences.en: Total devotion it certainly was, slavish devotion some would say.
sentences.cn: 这当然是绝对的忠诚，有人也许会称之为俯首帖耳，唯命是从。

sentences.en: Why not abandon this slavish devotion to metaphor and give the user easy access to functions?
sentences.cn: 为什么不放弃隐喻,使用户更容易访问功能?
